name: El Ministerio del Tiempo VR: Salva el tiempo
summary: "Save the Time" is a virtual reality experience in which you'll be inside one of the best television series in Spain," The Ministry of Time ". In this experience, you​'ll​ live an adventure in first person​,​ try​ing​ to dismantle the plans of the "Angel Exterminator"​ sect​ ​as they tr​y to change the history of Spain and to destroy the Ministry. ​During these 15 minutes, you will face several challenges against time that you will have to solve with ability and cold blood.
